EmailTemplate.name: 2019_Global_Nurture_GoDirect_ATR_mih.201906_Global_Nurture_GoDirect_ATR_Email2_m
EmailTemplate.subject: Setting the New Standard for Passenger Connectivity
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
New from Honeywell – a full range of connectivity services, hardware, applications and tools to reduce the cost of providing your passengers with the fast, reliable Wi-Fi experience they crave.
Honeywell recently expanded our connectivity offering to the airline market to became a global reseller of Inmarsat’s GX Aviation. This means your airline can now leverage a full service and hardware solution, along with a suite of tools to keep your passengers connected and entertained.
Take passenger experience to the next level with services from GoDirect!
LEARN MORE <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/Honeywell-JetWave-Provides-High-Speed-Connectivity-Globally?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_spog_atr&utm_content=marketo]]>
